name: card-key
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Opens doors in the goldenrod city Radio Tower.
short_effect: HS: Opens doors in the Radio Tower. Gen III: Unlocks Silph Co Doors.

flavor_text.emerald: A card-type door key used in SILPH CO’s office.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A card-type key that unlocks doors in SILPH CO.’s HEAD OFFICE in SAFFRON CITY.
